original_text: Later, knowing that everything had now been finished, and so that Scripture would be fulfilled, Jesus said, “I am thirsty.”
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 모든 일이 이미 이루어진 줄 아시고 성경을 응하게 하려 하사 이르시되 내가 목마르다 하시니

sentences.original_text: Later, knowing that everything had now been finished
sentences.korean_translation: 나중에, 모든 것이 이제 완성되었다는 것을 알면서

sentences.original_text: and so that Scripture would be fulfilled
